name: C++ Vector
description: C++ vectors are sequence containers representing arrays that can change in size

Iterators.val: Returns an iterator pointing to the first element in the vector
Returns an iterator referring to the past-the-end element in the vector container
Returns a reverse iterator pointing to the last element in the vector
Returns a reverse iterator pointing to the theoretical element preceding the first element in the vector
Returns a const_iterator pointing to the first element in the container(C++ 11 Only)
Returns a const_iterator pointing to the past-the-end element in the container(C++ 11 Only)
Returns a const_reverse_iterator to the reverse beginning of the sequence(C++ 11 Only)
Returns a const_reverse_iterator pointing to the theoretical element preceding the first element in the container(C++ 11 Only)
